tool_description: Tracks and monitors app submission status across multiple platforms, providing real-time updates and next action recommendations.

app_identifier.description: Unique app identifier or bundle ID

track_rejections.description: Whether to track and analyze rejection reasons

error_messages: Invalid app identifier: App identifier format is invalid or not recognized.
Platform mismatch: Number of platforms must match number of submission dates.
Invalid date format: Submission dates must be in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).
Unsupported platform: Only 'ios' and 'android' platforms are supported.
Future date error: Submission dates cannot be in the future.
usage: Provide app_identifier, submission_platforms, and corresponding submission_dates. Optionally disable rejection tracking. Tool monitors status and provides actionable insights.

estimated_approval.description: Estimated approval dates for pending submissions

next_actions.description: Recommended next actions for each platform
